trans-unit.source: The SignerInfoEnumerator class provides enumeration functionality for the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfoCollection"></xref> collection.

The Current property retrieves the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfo"></xref> object from the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfoCollection"></xref> collection.

A <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfo"></xref> object that represents the current signer information structure in the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfoCollection"></xref> collection.

The MoveNext method advances the enumeration to the next <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfo"></xref> object in the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfoCollection"></xref> collection.
This method returns a bool value that specifies whether the enumeration successfully advanced.

If the enumeration successfully moved to the next <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfo"></xref> object, the method returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
If the enumeration moved past the last item in the enumeration, it returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

The Reset method resets the enumeration to the first <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfo"></xref> object in the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfoCollection"></xref> collection.

The IEnumerator.Current property retrieves the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfo"></xref> object from the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfoCollection"></xref> collection.

A <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfo"></xref> object that represents the current signer information structure in the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfoCollection"></xref> collection.
